revised_title: A Case Study of Cystic Swelling and Peritonaeum Distention
tldr: This case study examines a patient with a large quantity of water-filled cysts adhering to the peritoneum, causing abdominal distention. Upon autopsy, the peritoneum was found to be significantly thickened and filled with numerous glands, and the patient's organs were examined in detail to understand the cause of the condition.
